title: I need 32RP for the Omega squad twitch skin.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I need 32RP for the Omega squad twitch skin.
All i want for christmas are these 32RP <3
I hope my great effort in recreating the twitch picture, helps you in your decision <3

replies.body: This is a great drawing, I really like the ears!  :D  Thanks for the effort, you might find this goodies on your account.  :)
